intro: Thermopsis glabra, commonly known as yellow rocket, is a flowering plant native to North America. It is a member of the Papaveraceae family, which includes poppies and罂粟. The plant is characterized by its bright yellow, daisy-like flowers and linear, grass-like leaves. It typically grows in open, disturbed habitats such as roadsides and fields. Thermopsis glabra is known for its ability to thrive in a variety of soil types and its role in supporting pollinators.
